Class LdapProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.ldap.autoconfigure.LdapProperties
@ConfigurationProperties("spring.ldap") public class LdapProperties extends Object
Configuration properties for LDAP.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Eddú Meléndez
